summary:
Beautiful bright eyes for characters. Vivid detailed colors without performance loss!
If you use this, please Endorse it!
descriptionHtml:
PLEASE CHECK OUT: Fountain of Youth - Female Beauty Project
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2535

Bright Eyes
version 1.3
by Skree000

Description:
Texture replacements for all human, elf, orc and vampire eye colors.
Bloodshot eyes have been replaced with more exotic nonbloodshot versions, indigo and deep red.
Colors that were very similar have been replaced with new ones. (Ie. Brown, Lightbrown and Dark brown)

Changelist 1.3
Blood Red vampire eye replaces the pink and yellow bethesda version
Amber eye slightly brightened and pupil a touch smaller

Changelist 1.2
Enriched the eyes with more detail, and slightly brought the intensity down to prevent every npc from
having glowing eyes in the dark.
Added smooth shading around the outsides where the eye sinks into the eyelid
Added shading to the tops of the pupils to simulate lid shadowing
Shrank the size of the iris on all pupils.
Toned down some of the non human eyes that were a bit too cartoony.


Contains:
Texture replacers for eye colors in DDS format

These files overwrite those located at \\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\eyes\\
using the following filenames:

eyeamber.dds
eyeblind.dds
eyeblue.dds
eyebluebloodshot.dds
eyebrown.dds
eyebrownbloodshot.dds
eyedarkelf.dds
eyedarkelfdeepred.dds
eyedarkelfdeepred2.dds
eyegreen.dds
eyegrey.dds
eyehazel.dds
eyehazelbrown.dds
eyehighelf.dds
eyehighelfdarkyellow.dds
eyehighelforange.dds
eyelightgrey.dds
eyeorcblind.dds
eyeorcdarkgrey.dds
eyeorciceblue.dds
eyeorcred.dds
eyeorcyellow.dds
eyesdarkblue.dds
eyesiceblue.dds
eyevampire_01.dds
eyewoodelf.dds
eyewoodelfdeepbrown.dds
eyewoodelfdeepviolet.dds
eyewoodelflightbrown.dds
eyeyellow.dds


instructions:
Unpack the included files to your \\skyrim folder and it should automatically do the rest.

Credits:
Bethesda for this awesome game!

Known Bugs: 
The eyeballs included with human races have a strange fleshy triangular bit on the inner corner which shows up as a slightly strange flesh colored
sliver when certain eye shapes are used.
This is a UV problem on the eyeball meshes themselves, and can be cured at a future time, but for now, the eyes look good in most conditions.
author: Skree000

files.name: Bright Eyes v1_2
files.changelogHtml:
Toned down intensity and saturation of eyes slightly to prevent glowing-in-the-dark on all npcs
Added realistic shading to eye whites and pupil tops, simulating lid shadowing
Reduced size of iris to give a more colorful look
Added heaps more detail, while SHRINKING each textures size more than 4 times smaller! (DDS compression magics!)

files.name: Bright Eyes v1_3
files.changelogHtml:
Vampires now with deep blood red eyes, rather than pink and orange defaults
Amber eyes retouched and slightly brighter, smaller pupils
